document.full_text: former illinois governor rod blagojevich denied tuesday that he tried to extort $500,000 from a road building executive in exchange for a multi-billion dollar road improvement plan.
document.title: rod blagojevich denies shakedown of road builder
lines_and_colors: former illinois governor rod blagojevich denied tuesday that he tried to extort $500,000 from a road building executive in exchange for a multi-billion dollar road improvement plan.
